title: A Look of Love
description: Noelle should have leapt for joy when Jack proposed. Instead she asked for time.Why couldn’t she bring herself to say ‘yes?’Too distracted to see the ice, her car slips off the road on the way to her brother’s wedding reception.Can the handsome blue-eyed stranger who comes to her rescue provide an answer to her dilemma?A Look of Love is a short story by the Debbie Macomber contest winning author, Darlene Panzera.
author: Darlene Panzera
